name: Block Puzzle: Wood Brain Games
description:
Wood Block Puzzle is a classic addictive wooden style block puzzle game. More wood blocks crush, more score you will get. Try it and you will love this wood block puzzle game.

HOW TO PLAY WOOD BLOCK PUZZLE?
- Drag and drop blocks into 10×10 grid.
- Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
- No time limits.
- Get as many scores as you can to become the best block crush at Wood Block Puzzle.

FEATURES OF THE WOOD BLOCK PUZZLE:
- Wood Block Puzzle Game is a FREE, classic and challenging game!
- You can play anytime and anywhere!
- Quick to understand rules, easy to control.
- Truly enjoy the fun of puzzle game: NO Wi-Fi needed.

Are you ready to challenge your limit? Let's enjoy this block puzzle game and become a master!

Play puzzle games for adults like Wood Block Games to train your brain every day!
